mutants.code:
def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) - background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) * background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude * (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude // (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 - ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 * ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (2 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (0 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (0 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (-1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + (x - x0) / sigma * 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma + 2)) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) * sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) // sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 3) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 1) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 0) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** 1) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x - x0) / sigma) ** -2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + ((x + x0) / sigma) ** 2) + background

def lorentzian(x, amplitude, x0, sigma, background):
    return amplitude / (1 + (x * x0 / sigma) ** 2) + background
